name: Rutracker Clean UI 2017
description:
Clean style for Rutracker.org/Rutracker.net/Maintracker.org with no ads and unnecessary elements.

Чистый и легкий интерфейс для сайта Rutracker.org, без рекламы и ненужных элементов. Немного изменен стиль сайта.
css:
@-moz-document domain("maintracker.org"), domain("rutracker.org"), domain("rutracker.net") {

#nav-panel {
border: 0;
}

#adriver-240x120,
#bn-bot-wrap,
.bn-idx,
#bn-idx-marathonbet,
#bn-idx-3,
#idx-sidebar2 iframe,
#logo,
.row1.pad_6.nav > p:nth-of-type(1),
.pad_2.vBottom.w100 > .small:nth-of-type(1),
.maintitle,
#main-nav,
#page_footer,
#sidebar1,
.spacer_6,
table.w100 iframe,
td.bn-topic,
.thHead,
.vMiddle,
.sb2-block,
.ta-inf2.top-alert,
#forums_wrap > .w100 > tbody > tr > td:nth-of-type(2),
.w100:nth-of-type(6) > tbody > tr > .w100.nav,
.sig-body,
.sig-sep,
.post_btn_2,
.flag,
.joined,
.from,
.rank_img,
.avatar,
.vTop,
#thx-block > .sp-wrap,
.bw_TRL.border.w100,
.tCenter.row3,
.clearfix.sp-wrap.post-align,
.pad_2.w100 > tbody > tr > td:nth-of-type(1),
.pad_2.w100 > tbody > tr > .w100.nav,
.catTitle,
.catBottom,
.pad_8.bCenter.borderless,
.tCenter.pad_2.row5,
.pad_4.row3,
.pad_2.cat,
.bottom_info,
.w100:nth-of-type(7),
#moderators,
.med.catBottom,
.pad_2.vBottom.w100 > .w100 > tbody > tr > .pad_2:nth-of-type(1),
.nav-hidden-overlay,
#nav-up,
#nav-down,
.nav-panel,
#nav-settings,
.nav-hidden-arrow {
    display: none;
}
}
